original_title: The Devil Made Me Do It
overview: Ian Leslie (The Aussie Geraldo Rivera) focuses on well known cases of Satanic killings in the United States and England. It gathers a group of victims, heavy metal singers, clergymen, experts and Satanic leaders for a lively studio debate. The Australian counterpart to Exposing Satan's Underground.
tagline: Like AIDS and Drugs, Satanism won't go away by ignoring it
title: The Devil Made Me Do It
